home.title2: Give your skin the love and care.
home.description: Beauty is a state of mind, not a state of the body.
home.joinOthers: Join others who've purchased our products

service1.title: Clinique
service1.description: Clinique is well known for their philanthropic efforts in supporting women's health initiatives.

service2.title: Estée Lauder
service2.description: Estée Lauder is famous of their high-quality formulas, elegant packaging, and dedication to innovation in beauty.

service3.title: L'Oreal
service3.description: Founded in France in 1909, L'Oreal is known for their innovative formulas and commitment to sustainable beauty.

service4.title: MAC - MAC
service4.description: They are known for their high-quality, professional-grade makeup products that cater to a diverse range of skin tones and types.

whyGear.title: “Got 99 problems, but skincare ain't one, thanks to Cosmetica”
whyGear.description1: Cosmetica is the go-to destination for all your cosmetic needs.
whyGear.description2: Offering a wide range of products to help you achieve healthy and glowing skin. Our philosophy is to provide high-quality, affordable cosmetics without compromising on quality. We believe that everyone deserves to feel confident and beautiful in their own skin. Our user-friendly online platform makes shopping for cosmetics fast, easy, and stress-free, with the convenience of having your products delivered right to your doorstep.
whyGear.description3: Trust Cosmetica for all your cosmetic needs - because beauty should be effortless and accessible to all.

step1.title: 1.  Select Products
step1.description:
Visit the website of the online cosmetic store and browse through the products available.
 Choose the products you wish to purchase by selecting the appropriate quantity and adding them to your shopping cart.

step2.title: 2. Check Out and Make Payment
step2.description:
Once you have selected all the products you wish to purchase, proceed to checkout.
 Ensure that you review your order details before making the payment.

step3.title: 3. Shipping and Delivery
step3.description:
After successful payment, the online cosmetic store will process your order and dispatch it to your shipping address.
 You will receive an email confirmation with the expected delivery date and tracking details.

step4.title: 4. Receive and Enjoy Your Products
step4.description: Once your order is delivered, inspect the products to ensure that they are in good condition.  If everything is in order, start using your new products and enjoy the benefits they offer!

home.customer: What customers are saying about us

carSellingPlatform.title: Welcome to Cosmetica, The premier online platform for all your cosmetic needs.
carSellingPlatform.description1: Our platform offers a fresh approach to cosmetic shopping that lets you browse, compare, and purchase products from the comfort of your own home, without any hidden fees or additional charges.
carSellingPlatform.description2: Our goal is to provide you with a seamless experience will bring back more time to your day, reduce stress and the entire process is done online without you having to step out of your home.
carSellingPlatform.description3: It’s fast and easy. Join cosmetic shopping today!

contactUs.submitQuestionDescription:
If you have any questions, or would like to get in touch with us, our team at Cosmetica would be more than happy to help you.
Please contact us at <1>hello@cosmetica.co.nz
contactUs.viewFaqDescription:
If you haven’t yet checked out our <1>FAQ Help Page, we may be able to help answer your questions there.
If you still need support from us, you can reach our Customer Service Support Team who willl aim to respond to all customer enquiries within 2 working days
contactUs.areCarDealershipDescription: If you’re a cosmetic dealer interested in sellers, view our <1>website</1> site here.
contactUs.newsAndPressDescription:
We would be happy to comment and provide information on Cosmetica, industry updates or trends to local, nationwide and global news publishers.
For press related questions, email <1>hello@cosmetica.co.nz

faq.faqDescription: Discover tips and tricks, find answers to common questions, and get help!
